title: Fix: Mistral model broken due to config key case mismatch
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Mistral speaks again
gist.blurb: We fixed a case-sensitivity bug that was silencing the Mistral model. It's back to chatting happily.
gist.summary: Resolved a configuration key mismatch that caused 500 errors when accessing Mistral models.
gist.impact: Users can now reliably generate text with Mistral without encountering server errors.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a tiny mechanic fixing a retro text machine. The key visual is the bee swapping a capital 'M' block for a lowercase 'm' block to make the machine work. Represents the case-sensitivity fix.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot repairing a retro text-processing machine. The bee is placing a glowing lowercase 'm' block into a slot. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi study vibes. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot repairing a retro text-processing machine. The bee is placing a glowing lowercase 'm' block into a slot. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi study vibes. Nostalgic but beautiful.
